basics.name: Erica Luo
basics.summary: Senior at the University of Washington majoring in Informatics and Psychology.

work.company: Psychiatry and Behavioral Sciences, UW School of Medicine
work.summary: Working on a digital budget tracker that serves as a intervention for alcohol usage
highlights: Conducted and facilitated 2 individual user interviews, applying qualitative methods to uncover user needs
synthesized feedback to inform feature design and app improvements
Analyzed qualitative data from 2 young adult focus groups, coding qualitative data to identify behavioral patterns, motivations, and barriers to engagement
Co-authored and edited a research summary report for 4 focus groups, later presented at the 48th Annual Research Society on Alcohol Scientific Meeting in New Orleans, LA

work.summary: Assisted in a multidisciplinary menstrual cycle study analyzing behavioral, hormonal, and mood fluctuations through longitudinal data collection
highlights: Extracted, cleaned, and preprocessed complex survey and biometric datasets from 100+ participants using R (tidyverse) and Python (pandas, numpy), ensuring data quality and consistency for downstream analysis
Managed study logistics including issuing participant reward payments, maintaining compliance with study protocols

courses: Data Structures and Algorithms, Client-side Development, Database Management, Product Management, Scientific Theory and Methodology

skills.name: Research
keywords: Usability research and evaluation, focus group facilitation
Technical and academic writing, research documentation
Project planning, experimental design, survey design

skills.name: UX Design + Front-end Development
skills.keywords: Canva, Miro, Figma, HTML, CSS, React.js

skills.name: ML + Data tools
skills.keywords: PyTorch, scikit-learn, JupyterHub, Tablau, GitHub, TensorFlow, Pandas, RStudio, SQL, MatLab
